alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Throckmorton County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Throckmorton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton, Woodson, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209, Lusk and The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
